description: Support PAU to develop capacity for Policy Analysis and strengthen implementation of CPAP.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Strengthening the PAU is critical to providing consistency between annual sector commitments and long-term aspirations of Government as expressed in Vision 2020, the Poverty Reduction Strategy Paper and other development assistance frameworks to which the Government is a signatory. There is an urgent need to have a strategic unit at the highest executive level to improve oversight and support cabinet in making informed decisions. Enhanced/Improved Implementation of project activities within the two Programme Clusters.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: UNDP Support to CB of Policy A
